entries.description: Amazon Q: Fix race condition causing "Can't remove document listener" error during LSP restart
Amazon Q Chat: Fix chat history restoration to display rich UI elements and persist user preferences
Amazon Q: Fix LSP server startup failure when Node.js runtime path is configured as a directory instead of the executable path
An upcoming release will remove support for JetBrains Gateway version 2025.2 and for IDEs based on the 2024.3 platform
